item.title: TLDR: Bite Sized Article Takeaways
item.description: Guzey’s Productivity System Link to article If you’ve been procrastinating for most of the day: Accept that you won’t do anything today, and don’t get angry at yourself Set an alarm for when you’ll prep for bed Procrastinate for the rest of the day When the alarm rings pack your laptop and everything else you need for work in your backpack When you wake up leave the house immediately with your backpack Go to a library, caffe, or other place to GSD Return home in the evening Context intentionality as the difference home and every other place on earth

item.title: Who Do I Want to be in Five Years?
item.description: Until today I didn’t have an answer. I didn’t have a clear idea of what I was working towards in life. What did I want to acheive, what kind of person did I want to become? It felt like I was lost, driving without a destination. I spent some time introspecting, here’s my answer: In five years I want to be the guy you go to if you have an awesome idea and need it built.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi I’m Liam, a 17 y/o who’s trying to understand the world and myself. What I Do + Machine learning research intern at Layer 6 + Machine learning developer intern at SickKids + Learning full stack web devlopment (MERN stack) + Playing piano + Occasionally I write here

item.title: Reading List
item.description: Articles Worth Reading Thought To My Younger Self If you’re good, you need to talk more Invisible asymptotes Don’t Call Yourself A Programmer, And Other Career Advice On Friendship and on Finding Your People A Retrospective on Four Years in College Great Hackers Beating the Averages What You Can’t Say Revenge of the Nerds Why Nerds are Unpopular How to Make Wealth The Word “Hacker” How to Do What You Love Burdens The Parable of the Talents Genetic Russian Roulette SSC Book Review: Twelve Rules for Life SSC Book Review: Zero to One SSC Book Review: Red Plenty SSC Book Review: The Black Swan SSC Book Review: Chronicles of Wasted Time What Universal Human Experiences Are You Missing Out On Without Realizing It?
